UserDefinedLabelAssignment.name: UserDefinedLabelAssignment
UserDefinedLabelAssignment.description: Represents a relationship between a record label and the item the user assigned it to.

EntityType.description: Object label of the Item record derived from ItemId. Available in API version 62.0 and later.

ItemId.description: ID of the Item record added to the UserDefinedLabel record.

LabelId.description: ID of the UserDefinedLabel record that the Item record is assigned to.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user or group that owns this record.

SortOrder.description: Order of the assigned items for a given UserDefinedLabel record.

SubjectOrName.description: Name of the Item record. If it's a task, the value is the subject of the Item record.
